Text:
I believe this is a Telecine, since you can see the markings in the upper right corner sometimes (like on a cinema movie when they need to switch reel or whatever)

Anyways, the image and sound is very nice, very watchable :)
pretty good quality actually, feels a LITTLE cammy, but overall very watchable. Great movie too, this download is highly recommended

there is a true scr floting around : 1408.2007.DVDSCR.DVDR-NoGrp

;)

Uh, don't bother downloading this one.  There's no sound.  K-lite, VLC, Classic Media Player, full codec installed . . .nothing.

This is why it's only been downloaded 20 times. Can't believe I'm the first one to identify this as a total piece of shit.

I have sound, playing with mplayer.

Also quality is really good for such an early release, the contrast is bad and it's somewhat blurred, but it's barely noticeable. It's not worth waiting for better release if you want to watch it now.
